poem:
Title: "Echoes of Discord" 

Bullets whisper chaos, Europe shivers,
Death's cold specter on her porch. 
Fico lies, hurt yet defiant,
Balancing on the precipice of not yet gone. 
Words of war, sympathy's garb,
Foster fractures in common hearts. 
Unseen, the puppeteer pulls his string,
The hushed trigger echoes in quiet despair.
In folly, we sow our own demise,
Yet offer prayers for the wounded.
